name: ldap-searchEntries
short_description: ldap-searchEntries.pl is a small perl script that searches for entries based on a list provided by STDIN. The values given from STDIN are parsed into a filterstring containing placeholders. The found DNs are printed to STDOUT for each search. Parameters allow fine tuning of all features including attribute printing.
